entry.title: Israeli Leaders Resist Calls for Longer Cease-Fire With Hamas
entry.content: Prominent right-wing members of Israelâ€™s government laid down a firm marker that talks brokered by the U.S., Egypt and Qatar were only about releasing hostages.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What We Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.

entry.title: Thailand's Hostage Crisis in Gaza Takes a Shocking Turn: 'I'm Not Dead Yet!'
entry.content: Farmworkers feared killed by Hamas are returned to their families, as dozens of other nations mount diplomatic campaigns for their citizens.
